com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface IBMECMAuthenticatorDataSource
extends Serializable
    The data source that is used to inject a custom third-party authentication mechanism into this framework.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IBMECMAuthenticator getCustomAuthenticationForUrl(String url)
      This method is called only if the method 'customAuthenticationIsRequiredForUrl' returned a value of true for the same URL.
      boolean isCustomAuthenticationRequiredForUrl(String url)
      This method is called every time authentication is about to take place.

    • Method Detail

      • isCustomAuthenticationRequiredForUrl

        boolean isCustomAuthenticationRequiredForUrl(String url)
        This method is called every time authentication is about to take place. When this method is invoked, it gives you the opportunity to inspect the URL and decide whether the custom authentication mechanism is applicable. This decision might be as simple as the URL pointing to a well-known host name or it might require a round trip to that server in order to understand what authentication method is required.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to log in to
        Returns:
        true if you intend to provide custom authentication for this URL, false otherwise

      • getCustomAuthenticationForUrl

        IBMECMAuthenticator getCustomAuthenticationForUrl(String url)
        This method is called only if the method 'customAuthenticationIsRequiredForUrl' returned a value of true for the same URL. If so, the IBMECMCore framework invokes this method to solicit the custom authentication method that you want to use. The return of this method must be an instance of IBMECMAuthenticator so that IBMECMCore has a reference to the class and calls it as it needs it.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to log in to
        Returns:
        an instance of IBMECMAuthenticator that implements the custom authentication logic
